name: Ar-Raheeq Al-Makhtum (The Sealed Nectar)
shortDescription: A comprehensive and authentic biography of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), widely acclaimed and awarded.

name: Stories of the Prophets
shortDescription: A collection of stories of the prophets mentioned in the Quran, based on authentic Islamic sources.

name: Hisnul Muslim (Fortress of the Muslim)
authorName: Sa'id bin Ali bin Wahf Al-Qahtani
shortDescription: A popular compilation of essential Quranic and Prophetic supplications for various occasions.

name: Paradoxical Sajid (Vol. 1)
shortDescription: A collection of essays addressing common misconceptions and questions about Islam in a modern context.

name: Riyadh-us-Saliheen (Gardens of the Righteous)
shortDescription: A widely revered compilation of Hadith (sayings and actions of Prophet Muhammad) covering various aspects of life.

name: The Clear Quran
shortDescription: A contemporary and easy-to-understand translation of the Holy Quran.

name: Great Women of Islam
shortDescription: Biographies of notable women in Islamic history who played significant roles in the early days of Islam.

name: The Productive Muslim
shortDescription: A practical guide for Muslims to achieve productivity and spiritual growth in their daily lives.

name: Lessons from Surah al-Kahf
shortDescription: An in-depth analysis and lessons derived from Surah Al-Kahf, a significant chapter in the Holy Quran.

name: Revive Your Heart
shortDescription: Inspiring reflections and insights to re-ignite one's faith and connect with the Quran.
